message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10, and we can both walk away with something.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. How about 80/20?
I'm still feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  If we don't agree now, inflation will eat away at our gains.
I'm not going to give in to your generosity, Alice. I think I deserve more. How about 70/30?
